main: ^You hear meowing coming from a hole a few feet away.
^"It looks like it’s coming from that hole, but it's too dark inside to see."
^"Maybe I have something I can use to help me see down there."
^(You can drag items from your inventory)
flashlightUsed: ^You turn on the flashlight and slowly bring over the hole. The light reveals a cat at the bottom. You look into her frightened brown eyes.
^"Poor kitty, it's too far down to reach. How can I convince it to come a little closer?"
treatUsed: ^You place the treat near the top of the hole. The cat's fur is all standing on end but it carefully moves closer to eat.
^"I think I can reach the cat now. I should prepare the carrier so I can put the cat in quickly."
cantUseYet: ^"Hmm...I don't think that will be helpful right now. Maybe I can use it later."
carrierUsed: ^"Great! Now I can safely rescue this poor cat."
^You look closer at the cat in the carrier. It looks like a stray since it doesn't have any collar.
^"I'll take it to the rescue center to give it a full check up."
